content:
Wondering if the NCTS has AMT/PBS mappings included?
And while I'm asking, does the AMT data also contain categorization like phychotropic, and S7 properties?
I believe they're working on the first
But I believe not for the second question(s). There does seem to be a Schedule 8 refset, but not 7
Some jurisdictions (i.e. VIC and TAS) have also created Schedule 4 3rd Party Reference Sets
